queries.desc: I want to know the available runways in a specific airfield and their lengths
queries.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX uri: <http://www.semanticweb.org/eng.mahmoud/ontologies/2014/11/AirportOntology#> select ?runway ?len where{ { ?airfield a uri:Airfield. ?runway a uri:Runway. ?airfield uri:AirfieldID ?id. ?runway uri:GroundSurfaceIsPartOf ?airfield. ?runway uri:Length ?len. filter ( ?id = '%s' ) } }

queries.desc: I want to know to find out which taxiways are locked (identified from the maintenance status) from a certain runway
queries.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX uri: <http://www.semanticweb.org/eng.mahmoud/ontologies/2014/11/AirportOntology#> SELECT ?runway ?taxiway where{ ?runway a uri:Runway. ?taxiway a uri:Taxiway. ?runway uri:GroundSurfaceName ?name. ?runway uri:HasExitTo ?taxiway. ?taxiway uri:MaintenanceStatus ?status. filter ( ?name = '%s' ). filter ( ?status = 'locked'). }

queries.desc: I want to know which runway or taxiway has 2 aircrafts at the same time
queries.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX uri: <http://www.semanticweb.org/eng.mahmoud/ontologies/2014/11/AirportOntology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?location where{ ?aircraft1 a uri:Aircraft. ?aircraft2 a uri:Aircraft. ?aircraft1 uri:IsLocatedIn ?location. ?aircraft2 uri:IsLocatedIn ?location. filter ( ?aircraft1 != ?aircraft2 ). }

queries.desc: I want to know the best gate for the aircraft to land in.
queries.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX uri: <http://www.semanticweb.org/eng.mahmoud/ontologies/2014/11/AirportOntology#> SELECT ?aircraft ?aircraftCap ?gate ?gateCap where{ ?aircraft a uri:Aircraft. ?gate a uri:Gate. ?aircraft uri:AircraftID ?id. ?aircraft uri:IsLocatedIn ?location. ?aircraft uri:AircraftPassengerCapacity ?aircraftCap. ?gate uri:GatePassengerCapacity ?gateCap. ?gate uri:GateIsPartOf ?airfield. ?location uri:GroundSurfaceIsPartOf ?airfield. filter ( ?gateCap >= ?aircraftCap) filter ( ?id = '%s' ). } ORDER BY ASC(?gateCap) LIMIT 1

queries.desc: I want to verify if there are any aircrafts at a given runway
queries.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX uri: <http://www.semanticweb.org/eng.mahmoud/ontologies/2014/11/AirportOntology#> ASK where{ ?runway a uri:Runway. ?runway uri:GroundSurfaceName ?name. ?runway uri:LocationOf ?aircraft. filter ( ?name = '%s'). }
